mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id as userId, a.user_type as userType, a.account_type_id as accountTypeId, b.type as accountType, a.name as name, a.surname as surname, a.birthdate as birthdate, a.gender as gender, a.email as email, a.password as password, a.user_photo as userPhoto, a.status as status, a.tx_id as txId, a.tx_host as txHost, a.tx_user as txUserId, a.tx_date as txDate, a.tx_update as txUpdate FROM user a, account_type b WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} and a.account_type_id=b.account_type_id and a.status=1
